mapper.update:
update lender_bank_card
lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_address_code = #{bank_address_code,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reserved_mobile = #{reserved_mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_card_verify = #{bank_card_verify,typeHandler=com.zhixindu.commons.handler.type.EnumValueTypeHandler},
where bank_card_id = #{bank_card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lender_bank_card set lender_id = #{lender_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_card_number = #{bank_card_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_address_code = #{bank_address_code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserved_mobile = #{reserved_mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_verify = #{bank_card_verify,typeHandler=com.zhixindu.commons.handler.type.EnumValueTypeHandler} where bank_card_id = #{bank_card_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
